name: BugCasterFishingForecast
0:
”Alexa, ask Bug Caster to get today's fishing forecast.”
”Alexa, ask Bug Caster what the fishing is like.”
”Alexa, ask Bug Caster should I go fishing?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bug caster
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you tired of coming up with excused to NOT go fishing?
 "Ah, its too windy, I'll never get a good cast in." 
"It's mid-summer, no chance they're biting." 

Or maybe that's just us. Regardless, we know even the most die-hard fishermen appreciate a heads up even if it's just on the wind they'll be dealing with. So why not ask BugCaster? 

This skill will continue to receive updates and may experience some difficulties in the early going while the skill is refined. Future updates will include the ability to ask for the forecast for a specific time in the near future, to get the best rated time throughout the day (and during daylight hours). Premium offerings may include a full week forecast with visual display.
